group_1.narration: This happened before I met you...@Before I became a Magical Girl...

group_1.textLeft: (I think I've got one in my pocket!@[chara:101001:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json]There! A bandage!)
(It wouldn't be like me [chara:101001:cheek_1]to just @go and hand him a band-aid...)

group_1.textRight: Oh! I've got a bandage! @Hang on, I'll be right there!

group_1.textLeft: (Again, I couldn't take even the first step.)

group_1.narration: Just a small step...@Why can't I even take a single step...?
It's not really my complex so much...@I'm just afraid of gettin' hurt.
It may not be a very me thing to do,@but...I should have given him a bandage@when he was hurt, and when I needed@help, I should have asked for it.
But...@What if he just stares at me in disbelief?@Or what if he laughs at me?
Just thinkin' about it makes me lock up.
I'm not brave enough to take that first step.

group_1.textLeft: I'm a coward...@There's nothin' masculine about me at all.

group_1.textRight: Make a contract with me and become a@Magical Girl.

group_1.narration: So anything is possible...even things@that are not scientifically possible...
So what do I do?@Do I wish to be lucky in love?
...No, that's not right.@It's okay to wish for that at a shrine.
But to wish for success in love when@you know for sure your wish will come@true just feels wrong.
So what will you do, Momoko?
One step... I want the courage@to take just one little step.
I want to see for myself what @lies beyond that first step.

group_1.textCenter: I want the courage to confess @my feelings to the boy I like.
(What should I do?@My wish really came true.)
(I can't run away now.@I won't stop myself from goin' forward...)
(I'm gonna go right now and confess@my feelings.)

group_1.textLeft: You don't have a girlfriend, do you?@In that case...
I'll work harder... I'll do what it @takes to make you like me more!

group_1.narration: It was only a few seconds, @but it felt like an eternity...
Too bad. I guess it's game over@for me... Goodbye, my first love...

group_1.textCenter: Once again, my timin' is the absolute worst!
I became a Magical Girl for this!
What was even the point of my wish?
Seriously, even I can't help[chara:101001:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_041.exp.json:motion_300] but laugh.

group_1.narration: Seriously, gimme a break.@It's not like me to cry over a broken heart.
